title: Total War: Warhammer [v1.6 + ALL DLCs + Multiplayer]
description:
Release Date: 24 May, 2016
Languages: EN / Russian

Release info:
The repack is based on the ISO images TOTAL.WAR.WARHAMMER-STEAMPUNKS and TOTAL.WAR.WARHAMMER.LANGUAGE.PACK-STEAMPUNKS: stp-tww.iso + stp-twwlp.iso
100% Lossless and MD5 Perfect: all files after installation are identical to the original release with a bit precision
Version of the game: v1.6.0, included and activated all 12 released DLC
After installing the repack in the folder NoDVD is available Total.War.WARHAMMER.V1.6.0.Steamworks.Fix-REVOLT, which allows you to play multiplayer through Steam with the owners of the same crack
NOTHING is cut, NOTHING is recoded
The ability not to download or install unnecessary voiceovers
Significantly improved compression (from 25 to 11.9 GB for any one language)
After installation, the option to check the checksums of all files is available to make sure that the repack is installed correctly
To install repaka requires at least 2 GB of free RAM (including virtual)
ATTENTION! If you install the repack for Windows 10 - run the installation in compatibility mode with Windows 7

DLC:
Total War: Warhammer - Bretonnia
Total War: Warhammer - Isabella von Carstein
Total War: Warhammer - Realm of The Wood Elves
Total War: Warhammer - Grey Wizard
Total War: Warhammer - Jade Wizard
Total War: Warhammer - Wurrzag
Total War: Warhammer - Grombrindal The White Dwarf
Total War: Warhammer - The King and the Warlord
Total War: Warhammer - The Grim and the Grave
Total War: Warhammer - Call of the Beastmen
Total War: Warhammer - Blood for the Blood God
Total War: Warhammer - Chaos Warriors Race Pack

Installation:
Mount & Install
Play
